CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_FIELD_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: How did you hear about us?
FEATURE_1_BODY: Seamlessly add a 'Hello World' button to your app or website with just a few lines of code. Our intuitive API makes integration a breeze.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Tailor the 'Hello World' button to match your brand's look and feel. Customize colors, fonts, and sizes to create a cohesive user experience.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Our 'Hello World' button works flawlessly across all major platforms and devices, ensuring a consistent experience for your users.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Stay ahead of the curve with real-time updates to the 'Hello World' button functionality, keeping your app or website fresh and engaging.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Gain valuable insights into user engagement with our comprehensive analytics suite, tracking 'Hello World' button interactions and performance.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Our dedicated support team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or issues related to the 'Hello World' button implementation.
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: This app is a user-friendly platform that allows you to create and share 'hello world' buttons with others.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: How do I create a 'hello world' button?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Simply click the 'Add Button' option in the menu, give your button a name, and our app will generate a unique 'hello world' button for you to share.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I customize my 'hello world' button?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! You can change the color, size, and text of your 'hello world' button to make it your own.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Is this app free to use?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, this app is completely free to use. We believe in making 'hello world' buttons accessible to everyone!
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our Hello World app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What is the Hello World app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: The Hello World app is a simple program that displays the message 'Hello World' and a button that says 'Hello World' when clicked.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Why was the Hello World app created?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: The Hello World app is often used as a basic example to introduce beginners to programming concepts and syntax. It's a simple program that helps new developers get started.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I use the Hello World app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Using the Hello World app is easy. Simply open the app, and you'll see the 'Hello World' message displayed. Click the 'Hello World' button to see the message again.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is the Hello World app available on different platforms?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Yes, the Hello World app is available on multiple platforms, including web, desktop, and mobile. The basic concept remains the same, but the implementation may vary slightly based on the platform.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I modify or customize the Hello World app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Absolutely! The Hello World app is designed to be a starting point for learning and experimentation. You can modify the code, add new features, or customize the appearance to suit your needs.
